text: Sverre Offenberg Løberg (4 April 1905 - 30 July 1976) was a Norwegian politician for the Labour Party. He was elected to the Norwegian Parliament from the Market towns of Telemark and Aust-Agder counties in 1934, and was re- elected on five occasions. Løberg was born in Skien and was deputy mayor of Skien city from 1925 to 1928, and later served as a member in the period 1934-1937\. ==Selected works== *Det jeg husker best (1966) ==References== * Category:1905 births Category:1976 deaths Category:Labour Party (Norway) politicians Category:Members of the Storting Category:Sachsenhausen concentration camp survivors Category:Norwegian World War II memoirists Category:20th-century Norwegian writers Category:20th-century Norwegian politicians
title: Sverre Løberg
